Summary: Mom & I were outside looking for meteors. We saw fast, erratic object before seeing meteor & plane later.
divs: Sighting DetailsIn driveway on hill outside Greenville Ky. Speed amd movement strikingly different from planes. Too many directional changes and far too large and multi-colored for meteor. Possibly military craft, but I was in Air Force & this was much faster and more agile than anything I've ever seen. If real, it should have been seen by others looking for meteors.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Greenville
There were no other sightings in Greenville on or around August 11th 2013
